name: G Jacob
review: A perfect place to have your hair cut come here quite regularly. It's what you expect, lovely staff very calm and relaxing salon. Other services are also available. They have an app where you can book appointments so very straightforward.

name: Anne Forrest
review: Rudi was my stylist for my blow dry sat knew exactly what do do with my hair first time I've not been disappointed he was very friendly and professional very happy definitely will be back when I'm back in London Friends hair was lovely too

name: Yolanda Fernandez Galiani
review: Finally I found a hairdresser who listens and understands what I want. I love my hair style and will be back again. Great location too and beautiful salon.

name: Eleni Tsigka
review: I Am very careful with my skin and very difficult in trusting any beautician. Majda is very knowledgeable careful and knows how to address the specific issues someone may have.

name: Kyri Sotiri
review: As a longstanding client of this wonderful Salon, I have nothing but praise for this welcoming, talented team. Thank you!

name: Dr Nuria
review: Love visiting the salon. Excellent and professional services, feeling at home. Always happy to go in and delighted and ecstatic when I leave the premises. Highly recommended.

name: Charlotte Wong
review: Keep going back to decadence time after time again. Reliable team of stylists, all-rounded professionals really, you're definitely guaranteed a satisfying experience overall!

name: Laurent B
review: Another great haircut. Arch always does a great job. The place itself is very stylish and everyone is so friendly. Highly recommended.

name: Stephanie Moumtzis
review: Really thrilled with my haircut by Alex, she did a fantastic job and went the extra mile to make it look nice. Will definitely be returning!

name: Josipa Raič
review: I've had a waxing session with Maida, she was professional and nice and she's done her job perfectly. Will be coming back for sure.

name: Tanya Lezaic
review: Massive thank you to the team at Decadence for the much needed and speedy delivery of Kevin Murphy supplies, especially the conditioning treatment. Can't wait to get back to the salon!

name: Lucie Pitcher
review: Lovely staff, great cut, reasonable price!

name: Fliss Davies
review: I have been a few times and the waxing is great... Mayda is very professional and i'm very happy with the results so far!

name: Hannah Budden
review: Felt at home immediately in this salon, warm, friendly but professional service and super happy with the finish. Would recommend!

name: Alice
review: Sorted my hair out after another salon had butchered it. Really happy with the cut. Really good service. Definitely recommend.

name: Olivia Levins
review: Had a fantastic massage for half the price I would’ve expected at a salon of this quality, would definitely return!

name: Natalie Benoy
review: One of the best haircuts I've had & very friendly people. Will definitely be back!

name: Adam Stokes
review: I've had all my haircuts here for the past 4 years, so good!

name: Lucien Goring
review: Staff are super friendly would absolutely recommend. My girlfriend and I went there together and had a great experience.

name: Artemis Petzetakis
review: Best haircut & blow dry from Arch!

name: Lizzy The Epic Lizard Gibb
review: Perfect chill out environment, colour services are amazing, lovely people!

name: Siri W
review: I cut over half my hair off here last week and I could not be more satisfied with the result. It’s nice and even. Perfect, thank you.

name: Zoej Iii
review: Had a makeover with Mark and it's amazing- my bff said he couldn't trust that I'd be nice anymore because I totally look like a bad b**** lol

name: Neil Lamb
review: Brilliant haircut followed by a very relaxing massage in a quality, serene atmosphere. Highly recommended!

name: Ava B
review: LOVE LOVE LOVE literally the best people.

name: Hana A.
review: My go to place for a pick me up blow dry, great products and amazing color with Tracy.. she's the best!

name: Pedram Nick Aryan
review: Love the service. Mark and Rudy are two of the best hairdressers for men I've ever had in UK

name: Sophia Carr
review: AMAZING!

name: Giuseppe Mario Cescutti-Fitz
review: Always amazing! Helpful. Professional. Prompt. Accommodating. Reliable. Just a great experience, each and every time.

name: Viktorija Stunzaite
review: Dan is amazing as always! Best hairdresser in town

name: Mirna Barac
review: Excellent service. Helpful, professional and skilled staff. Very easy to book appointments.

name: Alexia Hervieu
review: I just love this salon! Since I discovered it, 5 years ago, I never went anywhere else to cut my hair!

name: Fenella Alexander
review: Very professional for a good price! Happiest I've ever been with a haircut!

name: Marianna Filippou
review: My go to salon! Great quality hair products & really lovely staff!

name: Ryan Dee
review: I go regularly. Staff are lovely and you know you're going to get a good haircut.

name: Ana Carneiro
review: Really friendly and professional service, had an overall good experience and happy to support a local business

name: Susan Small
review: Always a pleasure

name: Jennifer Bryan
review:
Numerous haircuts over last several years
Shellac nail manicure

name: Bart Platak
review: Great prices, friendly staff and reasonably easy to book an appointment

name: Alistair Meeks
review: Fantastic haircut. Friendly, efficient service. I'll be back.

name: Rebecca Hope
review: Good service. The team always make you feel welcome.
